title: Christmas pudding
description: This really is a figgy pudding as it includes dried figs, as well as all the usual dried fruit. The fig seeds bring a hint of a crunch to the finished pudding, which makes for a first-rate texture. Make and steam it at least a month in advance, so that it has time to mature.
ingredients: 100g/4oz dried apricots, chopped (to about the same size as the raisins)
100g/4oz dried figs, chopped (to about the same size as the raisins)
75g/3oz high quality candied peel, finely chopped
150ml/5fl oz stout or similar dark beer
